statements: DELETE FROM ExpenseReports WHERE employee_id = 101 AND expense_date = '2022-01-15';

DELETE FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE request_id IN (SELECT request_id FROM reimbursement_requests WHERE amount > 1000);
